articles.title: Discover the all-new MG U9 — Now at Echuca MG
articles.author: Annie Barrow
articles.summary: Echuca MG announced the arrival of the new MGU9. The MGU9 represents a bold new chapter for MG and Australian drivers. It combines striking style, advanced technology, and exhilarating efficiency.

articles.title: Starling Bank launches AI tool for customers to spot purchase scams
articles.author: Belfast Telegraph
articles.summary: Starling Bank has launched a new [content incomplete, unable to produce a complete summary].

articles.title: Why Torito Bajaj is the Ideal Platform to Launch Your Content Writing Business
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Torito Bajaj is a specialized platform for content writing services, offering a focused ecosystem for writers and clients. The platform provides features like portfolio showcasing, niche specialization, secure payment systems, and performance analytics to empower content writers. Torito Bajaj aims to be a leading platform, giving writers resources to thrive in the evolving content marketing landscape.

articles.title: First Drive: Porsche's 911 Turbo S is back and more powerful than ever
articles.author: Jack Evans
articles.summary: Porsche has launched the 992.2-generation 911 Turbo S, featuring a 3.6-liter twin-turbocharged flat-six engine producing 710bhp and 900Nm of torque, enhanced by a hybrid system. The car achieves 0-60mph in approximately 2.5 seconds and is priced from £199,100.

articles.title: 14 Baby Products Launched in 2025 That Are Packed With Smart Features Parents Will Love
articles.author: Katie Ann Lehman
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced or updated baby products in 2025. Hatch launched Hatch Baby, a smart sleep solution. Stokke debuted the Yoga Baby Bouncer & Swing in April. WildBird released the Aerial Buckle Wrap offering a simpler design than traditional wraps. Owlet launched Dream Sight and Dream Duo baby monitors in September. Elvie launched Elvie Rise a smart all-in-one bouncer and bassinet in October. Cradlewise launched an all-in-one bassinet, smart crib and baby monitor in May. Little Sleepies launched a Newborn Capsule Collection in August. DFY debuted the R1 Stroller in April. Yoomi launched the Solace Bottle Warmer in June. Momcozy released the Air 1 Ultra-Slim Wearable Electric Breast Pump Set in 2025. Evenflo has the Shyft Intuiti+ modular stroller system.

articles.title: 32 Underrated Products You'll Be Glad You Bought
articles.author: Mariel Guzman
articles.summary: Essence introduces "What the Fake!" Plumping lip gloss with cinnamon oil, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E. E.l.f. launches Stay Cool Primer Stick infused with hyaluronic acid, aloe, and spring water along with Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara to give that eyelash extension effect without needing to put tweezers near your eyes.

articles.title: 5 takeaways from Elliott Hill's first year as Nike CEO
articles.author: Demi Lawrence
articles.summary: Nike products are mentioned.

articles.title: The beauty advent calendar that's sold out every year is worth £935 but costs £89
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Avant Skincare is launching its Wonders Advent Calendar for 2025, featuring £935 worth of skincare products for £99. The calendar includes 12 skincare products like the Pro-Intense Hyaluronic Acid Illuminating Day Cream and introduces an augmented reality experience. Select calendars contain Golden Tickets that give winners the chance to claim up to £1,000 worth of Avant Skincare products.

articles.title: Fans Are Calling Ninja's New BlendBoss ‘Powerful' and ‘the Best' for Making Smoothies
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the BlendBoss Tumbler Blender, a powerful and convenient single-serve blender designed for making smoothies and protein shakes. It features a 1,200-watt motor, four blending modes, dishwasher-safe parts, and portable tumblers, retailing for $139.99 on Ninja's website. Additional 26-ounce travel tumblers are available separately for $29.99 each.

articles.title: Meghan Markle shares three-word clue ahead of As Ever new product launch
articles.author: Lauren Welch
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, is launching a new product on October 28th, hinted to be holiday-themed. The brand, which launched earlier this year, already offers products like wines, preserves, and crepe mixes. Prior to this launch, As Ever successfully released a Sauvignon Blanc wine, following the launch of her 2023 and 2024 Napa Valley Rose.

articles.title: Pinterest Adds New AI Recommendation Tools
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Pinterest is launching new AI-powered recommendation features, including 'Make it yours' for fashion and home decor, 'More ideas' for other categories, 'Styled for you' collages for fashion, and 'Boards made for you' for personalized trend displays. These features aim to personalize the Pinterest experience and drive more shopping activity by highlighting relevant products to users.

articles.title: VideoMPEG.com Unveils Innovative Comparison and Review Hub for Video Software
articles.summary: VideoMPEG.com has launched a new comparison and review hub designed to assist video creators, brands, and agencies in evaluating essential software like editing suites, hosting platforms, and AI-driven production tools. The hub provides in-depth reviews and data-driven comparisons to empower users to make informed choices about video software.

articles.title: X Adds Another Anime-Inspired AI Chatbot
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: X has launched a new AI companion named 'Mika' as the latest addition to its suite of AI chatbot options. These AI chatbots are available to X Premium users and offer diverse interactions, including NSFW chats, and are also customizable with outfits like Halloween costumes or promotional attire like 'Tron: Ares' costumes.

articles.title: QR Codes as a Gateway to the Phygital Era — ME-QR Research
articles.summary: ME-QR unveils its platform for dynamic QR codes to enhance phygital experiences. The platform allows businesses to create, track, and personalize QR codes in real-time, offering analytics, content adjustment, and tailored experiences. ME-QR also plans to integrate AI-driven personalization and sustainability initiatives into its QR code offerings.

articles.title: Glazed, glowy, gorgeous: My full review of the viral L'Oreal Lumi Glotion
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: L'Oreal Paris has launched True Match Lumi Glotion, a product combining skincare and makeup for hydration and glow. The Lumi Glotion offers a buildable finish, versatility in application, and hydration through ingredients like glycerin and shea butter. It is positioned as a budget-friendly alternative to high-end luminizers and bronzing drops, suitable for those seeking a natural, radiant glow.

articles.title: GOIL expands footprint in Ashanti Region with opening of 86th fuel station in Esereso
articles.summary: GOIL PLC has opened its 86th service station in the Ashanti Region, offering premium fuels and services. The Esereso Service Station includes a lube bay, service center, mart, GO Café, barbering shop, and washing bay.

articles.title: Chelsey Smith Crowns: Modern Wigs and Styling Tips
articles.summary: Chelsea Smith Crowns is showcasing modern wigs with a live demonstration. Viewers will receive an exclusive discount.

articles.title: Telegram for Android Introduces Liquid Glass Touch Interface in Beta Update
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Telegram introduced 'Liquid Glass,' a revolutionary touch interface in its Android beta update. This interface includes dynamic ripple effects, synchronized haptic feedback, and contextual animations. Users can access the beta version to experience and provide feedback on this new feature.

articles.title: Digital Marketing Expert Tony Hayes Releases Comprehensive AI Implementation Guide for Content Creators and Entrepreneurs
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Tony Hayes, a Digital Marketing Strategist, published a new edition of his newsletter. This edition features 15 AI-powered strategies and provides complete implementation details.

articles.title: National Turnstile Systems Launches New Website, Enhances Customer Support
articles.summary: National Turnstile Systems has launched a new website providing improved navigation, faster product information access, and better resources for security needs. The site offers detailed information on optical, security, and full-height turnstiles, along with access control systems, emphasizing intuitive product selection and in-depth resources for professionals.

articles.title: Zaxby's Asian Zensation Menu: New Items You Need to Try
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Zaxby's is expanding its Asian Zensation menu with two new limited-time options: the Giant Asian Zensation Wrap and the Sweet Asian Glazed Chicken Finger Plate. These items will be available starting October 27 on the Zaxby's app, online, or via delivery platforms and will arrive at physical Zaxby's restaurants starting November 3.

articles.title: Google Cloud Targets Enterprise-Scale AI Training with Managed Slurm, Competing with CoreWeave and AWS
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google Cloud launched a fully managed Slurm service on October 27, 2025, designed to simplify large-scale AI training and directly compete with CoreWeave and AWS. This service aims to reduce the complexity and resource demands associated with managing Slurm implementations, allowing enterprises to focus on AI model development.

articles.title: Stop paying full price! Exclusive, limited-time Local Days discounts hit Collingwood
articles.summary: Georgian Bay Wet Cleaners offers 25% off household bedding. Theatre Collingwood promotes 25% off tickets to two November shows. Little Caesars Pizza features 2 for $6 Crazy Bread and a $9.99 3 Meat Treat Pizza. Pro-Fit Window and Door Wasaga Beach provides 25% off a patio door with the purchase of three windows installed.

articles.title: I just tested Oukitel's WP60, and it changed my mind about rugged smartphones
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Oukitel is promoting a new phone designed with a big screen, a large battery, and high performance capabilities.

articles.title: Coke's new product now available
articles.author: Leada Gore
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is rolling out its newest product, though availability might be limited initially.

articles.title: 489,000 Viewers for Yaksi Gozen!
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: TF1 launched Miraculous: The Adventures of Ladybug and Cat Noir Season 6, achieving high viewership numbers. The premiere episode 'Yaksi Gozen' attracted 489,000 viewers, demonstrating the show's ability to attract a valuable audience for advertisers. TF1 strategically positioned Season 6 as a cornerstone of its Sunday morning lineup, and the success is also a win for TFOU.

articles.title: Unlisted Named to Top 20 in TechCrunch Disrupt's Startup Battlefield Pitch Competition
articles.summary: Unlisted, a real estate technology company, has developed a platform that allows buyers to join Waitlists for homes not currently for sale and enables owners to showcase their properties. The platform aims to make every home visible, discoverable, and searchable using AI search, allowing potential buyers and owners to connect for future transactions.

articles.title: This Is The Best Early Black Friday Travel Sale We've See
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Simplify Living, an Aussie company, is having its biggest sale of the year with discounts ranging from 40-60% on travel products. The sale includes products like an anti-theft crossbody bag, compression packing cubes, luggage wheel protectors, a universal travel adapter, and a vacuum bag travel kit, all of which have received positive customer reviews.

articles.title: Chinese innovations convert smart ideas into global hits
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Several Chinese tech companies are launching innovative products. Rokid launched new AR glasses which saw 250,000 orders immediately after launch in June 2025, and Jackery introduced a new solar roof with curved tiles. Unitree R1 is launching an agile robot with price under 6,000 U.S. dollars.

articles.title: Summer Fresh® New Fall Launch
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Summer Fresh has introduced a new Truffle Dip, made with sour cream and truffle oil, designed for pairing with chips, bread, or vegetables. These dips are made with premium ingredients, contain no artificial preservatives, and will be available in the refrigerated deli aisle.

articles.title: 34 Personal Care Products Under $10 That Reviewers Can't Get Enough Of
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced including Witch Piggy Hell Pore Control serum that minimizes pores, fades dark spots, and delivers a glowing complexion. Eos launched Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion known for its moisturizing and pleasing scent, which users compare favorably to more expensive lotions. Elizavecca CER-100 Collagen Protein Treatment helps to restore and repair damaged hair.

articles.title: SEGG Media Accelerates Audience Growth Past 14.5 Million Views and Launches the Sports.com App ...
articles.author: SEGG Media Corporation
articles.summary: SEGG Media Corporation launched the Sports.com App, which is now available on the Apple App Store and other app marketplaces. The app's release signifies a significant advancement in the company's global sports-growth strategy, aiming to connect fans with live and on-demand sports content in emerging markets.

articles.title: Summer Fresh® New Fall Launch
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Summer Fresh® launched three new dips: Jalapeño Popper Dip, Hot Honey Chili Dip, and Truffle Dip, in October 2025. These flavor-packed creations are designed to satisfy seasonal cravings.

articles.title: OnePlus 15, Ace 6 with Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite series launched
articles.author: Deccan Herald
articles.summary: OnePlus unveiled a new product on Monday, October 27th.

articles.title: Lakeland's 6p an hour laundry gadget is my winter must-have — and it's currently on sale
articles.author: Kieran Ahuja
articles.summary: Lakeland launched the Dry:Soon Mini 3-Tier Heated Airer, a product designed for efficient and quick clothes drying, especially in small spaces. The heated airer is reported to dry clothes significantly faster than non-heated alternatives, costing only 6p per hour to run. It's compact design allows it to hold a full load of laundry while taking up minimal space.

articles.title: OnePlus 15, OnePlus Ace 6 launched in China: Specs, price, and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 15 and OnePlus Ace 6 in China. The OnePlus 15 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, a 165Hz display, and a triple 50MP camera system, starting at 3,999 yuan. The OnePlus Ace 6 boasts a 7,800mAh battery and a Snapdragon 8 Elite Extreme Edition chip, with a starting price of 2,599 yuan and is expected to launch globally as the OnePlus 15R.

articles.title: Why weird wins in modern marketing—and how brands are pulling it off
articles.author: Angelica Frey
articles.summary: Graza introduced a new glass bottle for its olive oil and expanded its product line with chips fried in extra virgin olive oil. The company also launched limited-edition items like the 'Drizzle Umbrizzle' umbrella and a festive turtleneck sweater for their signature squeeze bottles. Olipop collaborated with track and field news outlet Citius Mag to reach a greater audience and create viral social media content.

articles.title: M&S shoppers grossed out by newest bedding range as they make grim comparison
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) released a new bedding range and mugs with a Dalmatian-inspired print, which has received mixed reactions from shoppers.  H&M also features a similar speckled-glaze homeware range including bowls, mugs, plates, jugs, and a butter dish.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers 'go back for more' after spoting new £2.29 frozen item in stores
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new bake from frozen Portuguese Custard Tarts priced at £2.29. The supermarket also recently launched its new Hazel Nut-Cracker dessert ready for Christmas and limited-edition Cake Sandwich earlier this month.

articles.title: SolidPoint Review 2025: The Next Generation of AI Summarization
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: SolidPoint, an AI-powered platform, is introduced for summarizing content from diverse media such as videos and social media. It offers features like video and social synthesis, and customizable output formats. SolidPoint aims to help professionals, students, and content creators efficiently process information.

articles.title: New Look: UK fashion retailer launches Club New Look loyalty scheme with exclusive discounts
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: A new 'Club' program has launched, offering exclusive deals, early sales access, and prize-winning opportunities. This introduction aims to provide enhanced value to its members through various benefits.

articles.title: All-New Tata Sierra To Launch In November 2025 - Check Expected Price, Features And More
articles.author: Zee News
articles.summary: Tata Motors is set to launch the all-new Tata Sierra in November 2025. This marks the end of the wait for the new vehicle's release.

articles.title: Zaxbys Serves Up More Ways to Unleash the Flavor Zensation With an Expanded Asian Zensation Lineup and a Sweet New Holiday Shake
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Zaxby's is launching new menu items including the Giant Asian Zensation Chicken Finger Wrap, Sweet Asian Glazed Chicken Finger Plate, and Cookie Butter Shake. The Asian Zensation items will be available exclusively online starting October 27th and at all Zaxby's locations November 3rd, while the Cookie Butter Shake is a limited-time holiday offering.

articles.title: NinjaOne Automated Endpoint Management Platform Now Available in Microsoft Azure Marketplace
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NinjaOne's Automated Endpoint Management Platform is now available in the Microsoft Azure Marketplace. This provides Microsoft Azure customers worldwide access to NinjaOne's automated endpoint management platform and allows them to leverage Azure's scalability and reliability. NinjaOne's platform automates endpoint management, patching, and backup to simplify operations and improve efficiency.

articles.title: Zaxbys Just Dropped 3 New Menu Items—and We Have To Try Them All
articles.author: Kennedy Dierks
articles.summary: Zaxby's is introducing the Giant Asian Zensation Wrap and the Sweet Asian Glazed Chicken Finger Plate to its Asian Zensation lineup, available for a limited time starting November 3rd, with early access on October 27th through their app and website. Additionally, Zaxby's is launching a limited-time Cookie Butter Shake for the holidays, featuring vanilla ice cream, cinnamon-spiced syrup, and cookie pieces.

articles.title: OPPO Launches A6 Pro in Lagos
articles.author: Modupe Gbadeyanka
articles.summary: OPPO has launched the OPPO A6 Pro smartphone in Nigeria. The phone features a 7,000mAh battery with 80W SUPERVOOC Flash Charge, military-grade durability, 120Hz AMOLED display, and is available in 8GB+128GB and 8GB+256GB models.

articles.title: Amaze Unveils "Amaze Moments' - The AI Engine Powering the Future of Creator Commerce
articles.summary: Amaze Holdings, Inc. has launched Amaze Moments, an AI engine designed to help creators and brands capitalize on real-time trends. Amaze Moments interprets social trends and provides data-informed product recommendations to enable creators and brands to maximize revenue.

articles.title: TOZO Launches Open X2 Pro: The AI-Powered Smart Earbuds Redefining Intelligent Listening
articles.summary: TOZO has launched the Open X2 Pro, AI-powered smart earbuds featuring real-time translation, spatial audio, adaptive EQ, and gesture control. The earbuds, launching on Kickstarter on October 26, 2025, offer 10-hour battery life and IPX7 water resistance.

articles.title: The best Adidas hoodies for classic, sporty looks
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Adidas Originals Men's Trefoil Hoodie features the company's original trefoil logo and a regular fit. Adidas Women's Essentials Logo Fleece Hoodie is long, cozy, and has a loose fit. Adidas Men's Essentials 3-Stripes Fleece Hoodie features the brand's iconic three stripes on the sleeves and is made with partially recycled materials and sustainability-sourced cotton.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 with 6.78-inch 165Hz AMOLED display, 7,300mAh battery launched: Price, specs and more
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched its flagship OnePlus 15 smartphone in China, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, a 7,300mAh battery with 120W fast charging and 50W wireless charging. The OnePlus 15 will be the first device in India powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor and is expected to debut there by mid-November.

articles.title: Meghan Markle teases countdown to new product launch within hours
articles.author: Lauren Welch
articles.summary: As Ever, associated with Meghan Markle, is preparing to release a new Christmas-themed product. The product will be available from 9am PT/12pm ET on Tuesday, October 28.

articles.title: 'This £22 floral hair mist revives my locks and keeps them fresh between washes'
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Maria Nila has launched the Floral Drift Hair Mist, a hair mist designed to refresh hair between washes with a floral scent. Rare Beauty offers a mini Body & Hair Fragrance Mist as an alternative, while Rituals provides a 20ml Karma Ritual spray.

articles.title: Samsung folds again — this time three ways
articles.author: Jie Ye-eun
articles.summary: Samsung is set to introduce its first tri-fold smartphone at the APEC summit, featuring a 6.5-inch cover display that expands into a 10-inch main display and potentially powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The launch of this device represents a strategic move for Samsung to redefine the boundaries between smartphones, tablets, and laptops, and the initial production is estimated to be between 50,000 and 200,000 units.

articles.title: Hands-Free AI Smart Glasses to Redefine the Future of Delivery Efficiency
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: Amazon is launching AI-powered smart glasses for its delivery drivers. These glasses assist with package scanning, navigation, safety alerts, and feature a hands-free display.

articles.title: World's biggest VPN makes major change that BLOCKS access to porn
articles.summary: NordVPN has launched a new feature to block pornography on mobile and tablet devices. Additionally, NordVPN is developing a new app version for the Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Select, which uses the new Vega OS, to ensure its VPN service remains compatible.

articles.title: I can't stop writing in this gorgeous open-source notes app
articles.author: Adaeze Uche
articles.summary: Anytype, a note-taking application, features an object-based structure allowing users to create interconnected notes, pages, tasks, and files. It allows collaboration through shared spaces and offers control over data privacy with unique key-based encryption. Anytype is available on both mobile and desktop.

articles.title: Nala's Baby goes from strength to strength
articles.author: Joel Campbell
articles.summary: Nala's Baby is launching its All-Purpose Sterilising Spray, a 100% natural, vegan, and toxin-free product, expanding into the wider baby care market. The spray, formulated with Hypochlorous Acid and Water, kills 99.9999% of bacteria, viruses, spores, and fungi. Available in over 700 Tesco stores nationwide, the launch signifies a new standard for household hygiene.

articles.title: Sweet Indulgence Bakery continues mission to support domestic violence, sexual assault and human trafficking survivors
articles.author: Paige Sturek The News
articles.summary: Sweet Indulgence Bakery unveiled its new brand concept and logo at a launch event. The rebranding aims to further empower women who have survived domestic violence, sexual assault, and human trafficking. The bakery, located at 1010 McHenry Avenue, Suite H, offers catering for more information available on their website.

articles.title: Trump-approved cane sugar Coke launches in the U.S. Why isn't it in Canada?
articles.author: Mike Pearson
articles.summary: Coca-Cola launched a new soda made with cane sugar instead of high-fructose corn syrup. The soda is now rolling out in select cities and retailers.

articles.title: Lava Shark 2 launched for Rs 6,999, has 5000mAh battery and iPhone 16 Pro like design
articles.summary: Lava has announced the launch of its budget smartphone, the Shark 2 4G, priced at Rs 6,999. The Shark 2 features a 50-megapixel AI-powered rear camera, a 6.75-inch HD+ LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 5000mAh battery, and is powered by a Unisoc T7250 processor. It is available for purchase across Lava's retail partners.

articles.title: 29 Products With Glowing Reviews From Folks Over 60
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article highlights the Sol de Janeiro Bum Bum Cream known for firming and smoothing skin with caffeine, coconut oil, and guarana extract. The article also mentions Nivea's lightweight gel cream containing Q10 for plumper skin, Mielle's Rosemary Mint strengthening oil to help smooth split ends, Catrice's 'Instant Awake' under-eye brightener, Embryolisse moisturizing cream and Schick dermaplaning razors.

articles.title: How Beauty Brands Are Marketing To Gen Alpha Consumers
articles.author: Sarah Boyd
articles.summary: Several beauty brands are adapting marketing strategies to appeal to Gen Alpha, focusing on authenticity and interactive engagement. Sincerely Yours launched a 4-product skincare line including cleanser, serum, moisturizer and SPF. fwee's Pudding Pot and 3D Voluming Gloss gained popularity, while Tree Hut collaborated with Peanuts to launch their first co-branded product.

articles.title: Beauty insiders are buzzing about the new 24-hour serum foundation packed with anti-aging peptides
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Wonderskin has launched its new Hyper-Bond™ Serum Foundation, a multi-benefit product that combines foundation, serum, and primer in one. The foundation is available in 20 shades, claims to last 24 hours, and contains ingredients like niacinamide and hyaluronic acid for skincare benefits.

articles.title: Okay, Amazon's new AI shopping feature is actually pretty helpful
articles.author: Listen to
articles.summary: Amazon launched 'Help me decide,' a new AI shopping feature that rolled out on October 23. The feature analyzes shopping history, purchase details, and preferences to recommend products. It provides AI-generated summaries highlighting relevant product features and customer reviews.

articles.title: I tried OpenAI's new Atlas browser but I still don't know what it's for
articles.author: Mat Honan
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new web browser named Atlas with integrated ChatGPT and agent features. Atlas aims to allow users to browse, get direct answers, and automate tasks. The browser is being marketed aggressively through ChatGPT.

articles.title: Stained bedding can be made bright and white with oxy powder
articles.author: Matthew Evans
articles.summary: Daily Poppins recommends soaking stained bedding in an oxy powder solution because it uses an oxygen-based bleach. Astonish suggests dissolving their powder in warm to hot water and soaking bedding for one to two hours. Seep provides eco-friendly alternatives to harsh chemicals for cleaning, suggesting air drying and adding baking soda and white vinegar.

articles.title: Stranger Things season 5 official Netflix trailer
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Netflix released the official trailer for Stranger Things season 5.

articles.title: Philly Entrepreneur Maya Nazareth to Pitch Apparel Company Alchemize Fightwear on ‘Shark Tank'
articles.author: Jensen Toussaint
articles.summary: Maya Nazareth launched Alchemize Fightwear five years ago as a direct-to-consumer apparel brand for women in combat sports. The apparel is specifically engineered for performance, addressing wardrobe malfunctions experienced by women during training. Nazareth pitched Alchemize Fightwear on Season 17 of Shark Tank.

articles.title: Nespresso's hugely popular coffee advent calendars are back for 2025 - get them before they sell out again
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Nespresso is launching its 2025 advent calendars for both Vertuo and Original coffee machines, available from October 27, 2025. The Vertuo calendar costs £43, and the Original costs £39, each containing 24 specially selected coffee pods, including three festive blends, and a special coffee surprise on the final day. Both calendars are available on the Nespresso website.

articles.title: This top-rated laundry brand says it cleans your clothes better without the toxic chemicals: 'Why don't we just get rid of them?'
articles.summary: Dirty Labs has launched a probiotic-based toilet bowl cleaner that uses their proprietary Phytolase enzyme technology in combination with probiotic technology. It is also developing a concentrated dish soap that will be available with refills later this fall. The company previously launched laundry and dishwasher detergents.

articles.title: When will the OnePlus 15 with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, 50MP Dual Camera and 7,300mAh Battery launch in India?
articles.author: Monica Singh
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch the OnePlus 15 globally, including in India, after its debut in China on October 27. The OnePlus 15 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a 6.7-inch AMOLED 165Hz display, a 50MP Sony main camera, and a 7,300mAh battery with 120W Super Flash Charge and is expected to be priced between Rs 70,000 and Rs 75,000 in India in mid-November 2025.

articles.title: Samsung's next fold: three ways
articles.author: Ha Neul-Bit
articles.summary: Samsung is set to introduce its first tri-fold smartphone at the APEC summit, featuring a unique three-fold display and high-end specifications like a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 200-megapixel camera. The phone's initial production is expected to be limited, and it is intended to enhance Samsung's technological leadership rather than immediate sales.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 And OnePlus Ace 6 Launch At 4:30 PM: How To Watch Live Streaming Online, Price In India, Specs, What To Expect
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in China, featuring the DetailMax imaging engine and powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5. The OnePlus Ace 6, expected as the OnePlus 15R in India, is also launching. The OnePlus 15's global debut, including India, is expected on November 13.

articles.title: Nothing to Include Third-Party Apps on Select Phones, Adds 'Lock Glimpse' Feature with OS 4.0 Beta Update
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: Nothing is integrating third-party apps and services into their non-flagship phones to generate revenue and enhance user experience. These integrations will include popular platforms like Instagram and are intended to improve camera and sharing features. This move aims to ensure sustainable growth by offsetting Bills of Materials (BOM) costs.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Tri-Fold: Everything You Need to Know (Price, Release, Specs, & More!) Qrius
articles.author: Bhumish Sheth
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch the Galaxy Z Tri-Fold in the second half of 2025, with an expected price range of $3,000-$3,500. This tri-fold smartphone aims to offer a larger screen real estate through its unique design and targets tech enthusiasts and premium buyers.

articles.title: CNY Design for the Year of the Snake by Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products Wins Silver in A' Packaging Design Award
articles.author: Ein News
org: Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy ProductsMengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products
articles.summary: Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products received a Silver A' Design Award for their "CNY Design for the Year of the Snake" packaging. The packaging incorporates cultural elements and a unique double-layered label system with hidden blessings, aiming to enhance brand loyalty and consumer engagement.

articles.title: CNY Design for the Year of the Snake by Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products Wins Silver in A' Packaging Design Award
articles.author: Ein News
org: Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy ProductsMengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products
articles.summary: Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products received a Silver A' Design Award for their 'CNY Design for the Year of the Snake' packaging. The packaging features a double-layered label system with a snake pattern and hidden blessings, integrating cultural elements with modern design. The design aims to enhance brand loyalty and consumer engagement by creating a unique unboxing experience.

articles.title: CNY Design for the Year of the Snake by Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products Wins Silver in A' Packaging Design Award
articles.author: Ein News
org: Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy ProductsMengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products
articles.summary: Mengniu Gaoke Fresh Dairy Products received a Silver A' Design Award for their "CNY Design for the Year of the Snake" packaging. The innovative design incorporates traditional cultural elements, featuring a unique double-layered label system with hidden blessings, enhancing consumer engagement and brand loyalty. This reflects Mengniu Gaoke's commitment to pushing the boundaries of packaging design and setting new industry standards.

articles.title: Aldi Boosts Online Grocery In Hungary, Expands European Reach For ‘Golden Power'
articles.summary: Aldi Hungary has expanded its online shopping and home delivery service, offering 3,300 products to 3.2 million customers. Aldi Belgium is expanding its Golden Power energy drink to Germany, France, Spain, Portugal, and Poland by the end of 2025 and is introducing new Passion Fruit flavors.

articles.title: How to do more in 100 days than ever before
articles.author: Nick Sherrard
articles.summary: The article highlights the decreasing time required to develop and launch new products, citing examples such as Visa creating its first card in 90 days and Amazon launching Amazon Prime in six weeks. It emphasizes the need for ambition, honesty, and humility in managing innovation and accelerating product development within organizations, urging leaders to adapt to the rapid pace of change.

articles.title: Standard Bank's Shyft app triumphs at 2025 New Generation Awards
articles.summary: Standard Bank's Shyft app has been recognized with the Gold award for Most Innovative App Developed by a Corporate at the 2025 New Generation Awards. Since its launch, Shyft has evolved from a niche forex and travel app into a comprehensive global money solution offering cheaper forex rates, seamless offshore payments, borderless travel and shopping, and local and global investment opportunities. The app is available to both Standard Bank and non-Standard Bank clients residing in SA.

articles.title: Apple and Google make a Swift move closer, letting developers build Android apps with ease
articles.summary: The Swift SDK for Android has been launched, enabling developers to build Android applications using Swift. The SDK includes tools like the swift-java project for interoperability and is available via Windows installer, Linux, and macOS downloads.  The Swift Package Index now marks over 25% of packages as compatible with Android, offering a base of shared code for multi-platform projects.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Set to Launch Today at 4:30 PM: How to Watch the Livestream and What to Expect from the Flagship
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15, its next-generation flagship smartphone, on October 27 in China. The OnePlus 15 features a new in-house DetailMax imaging engine, a revamped design with a ceramic metal frame, and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. OnePlus will also debut the OnePlus Ace 6 at the event, which is expected to launch later in India under the name OnePlus 15R.

articles.title: Not To Brag, But This List Of 26 Walmart Problem-Solving Products I Have Compiled Is Like…Really Good
articles.author: Yi Yang
articles.summary: The article showcases various products available for purchase. These include a Neutrogena sunscreen stick, a travel-size toilet spray, a Scub Daddy multi-use sponge and paste kit and others. The products are accompanied by customer reviews.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launch In China Today: How To Watch Event, Specs And Price Expected
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in China on October 27, featuring a flat design, a 165Hz AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, up to 16GB RAM, and potentially 1TB storage. The phone will sport a 50MP triple camera system and a 7,000mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging.

articles.title: Google Nest Cam 2K: Review, Security & Smart Features
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google has launched new Nest Cam Indoor and Outdoor models featuring enhanced resolution, AI-powered awareness, and integration with Google Home Premium. These cameras offer features like AI detection and searchable security footage through the 'Ask Home' feature, providing proactive home security. Google Home Premium subscription unlocks full potential of the AI features.

articles.title: OnePlus OxygenOS 16 Rollout Date, Full List Of Supported Devices, Requirements, New Features And More
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced OxygenOS 16, a major software update based on Android 16, featuring a refreshed visual design and new AI-powered tools. The rollout is scheduled to begin in November 2025 with flagship devices like OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 12, and will extend to other models including the OnePlus Nord series and OnePlus Pads in December 2025 and early 2026.

articles.title: Building digital ecosystems: Sergej Loiter on how AI connects people, technology, and communities
articles.author: Gulf Business
articles.summary: Yango Group is leveraging AI to enhance and create new products and services. This includes Yango Yasmina, a bilingual voice assistant tailored for the Middle East, and autonomous delivery robots in Dubai. The company focuses on developing application-specific AI solutions and localizing technology to better serve individual markets.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launch today at 4:30 PM: How to watch livestream in India and what to expect
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in China on October 27, featuring a new design, DetailMax imaging engine (Lumo in China), and powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The device boasts a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED panel with a 165Hz refresh rate and is expected to launch globally, including in India, on November 13.

articles.title: Thread by @MiniMax__AI on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: MiniMax is open-sourcing MiniMax M2, an Agent & Code Native service, at 8% the price of Claude Sonnet and twice as fast. It offers advanced coding capabilities for developer workflows and high agentic performance for toolchains, and is globally free for a limited time through MiniMax Agent & API.

articles.title: Samsung Nepal presents Galaxy Z Fold7 and Flip7 to Shark Tank Nepal judges
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Samsung Nepal launched its new foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7, at an event with Shark Tank Nepal. The Galaxy Z Fold7 is focused on productivity and multitasking, whereas the Galaxy Z Flip7 combines a compact design with powerful performance.

articles.title: Ottogi announced on the 27th that it will launch four types of "Bungeoppang" (BUNG OPPANG) in the U...
articles.author: Park Yoon Ye
articles.summary: Ottogi is launching four types of Bungeoppang in the U.S. in December. The new product includes original red bean and cream flavors, along with matcha and sweet potato options to cater to local tastes. Ottogi aims to promote K-food by simultaneously developing K-street food lineups such as tteokbokki and seaweed roll along with bungeoppang.

articles.title: The EV that feels like wearing a Marlboro-branded nicotine patch, with a lousy digital experience
articles.author: Ed Lynch-Bell
articles.summary: Toyota's 'My Toyota' app is criticized for its poor digital experience when used with the Toyota bZ4X. The setup process for Apple CarPlay is cumbersome, requiring users to download the app and register, which involves multiple issues and bugs. The experience is considered not up to modern cybersecurity and privacy standards.

articles.title: NCS Taps Monks Singapore as Lead Brand and Web Agency
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: NCS partnered with Monks Singapore, leading to the launch of "New Horizon: the era of AI," a new thought-leadership program. The launch occurred at NCS Impact 2025, a forum that gathered business leaders and tech practitioners.

articles.title: BYD's Denza to establish 'bespoke' dealer network and owner benefits program
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: Denza Australia is set to launch its first two models, the B5 and B8 large off-road SUVs, with orders opening in mid-November and deliveries soon after. These plug-in hybrid vehicles feature powerful drivetrains, high towing capacities, and electrified four-wheel drive systems.

articles.title: BYD's Denza to establish 'bespoke' dealer network and owner benefits program
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: Denza, BYD's premium sister brand, aims to differentiate itself with a new dealer network and a customer experience program. This new service is intended to rival Lexus and Genesis.

articles.title: If You Remember This Old-School Fizzy Candy, You're Probably A '70s Kid
articles.author: Joe Hoeffner
articles.summary: Andre Prost Inc., led by Frank Landry, introduced Zotz candy to America after Landry received it as a gift in Italy in 1970. Seeing its popularity, Andre Prost Inc. began importing and distributing Zotz, quickly spreading its availability across the country.

articles.title: Debuting at APEC summit in Gyeongju, Samsung's tri-fold phone signals next chapter in foldable innovation
articles.author: Jie Ye-eun
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is set to introduce its first tri-fold smartphone, featuring a display that folds three times and an advanced camera, at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit. The phone, potentially powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite and having a 10-inch main display, aims to redefine the boundaries between smartphones, tablets, and laptops. Initial production of the tri-fold phone is expected to be limited, with an estimated price of $2,800.

articles.title: I wore the Meta Ray-Bans' successor for a month, and my buying verdict is two-fold
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: A second-generation of smart glasses has been released, featuring unspecified improvements. However, a competitor product is also considered better.

articles.title: 35 Tidy Products For People Whose Eye Twitches When They See Clutter
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Various new products designed for home organization are introduced, including stackable drawers for toys and clothing, organizers for kitchen and office supplies, and storage solutions for water bottles, nail polish, and other household items. These products aim to provide efficient storage and reduce clutter in homes.

articles.title: Dialogue AI: $6 Million Seed Funding Closed For AI-Based Customer Research
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Dialogue AI has launched a new AI-moderated research platform that automates the entire workflow from designing research studies to analyzing data for actionable insights. With \$6 million seed funding led by Lightspeed Venture Partners, Dialogue AI plans to accelerate product development and expand access to its research platform globally.

articles.title: LG U+ announced on the 27th that it has launched "U+one," a customer app that integrates services th..
articles.author: Jeong Hojun
articles.summary: LG U+ launched "U+one," a new customer app integrating services from existing customer center and membership applications. The app aims to simplify processes and enhance user experience by offering features like fee checking, membership benefits, and an AI search function.

articles.title: LG Energy Solution launches EV battery examination service
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Energy Solution Ltd. launched a new product or service.

articles.title: From Grass-Stained Pants to Game-Changing Gear: The Ghost Golf Story
articles.author: Brendon Elliott
articles.summary: Ghost Golf is launching a new Golf Club and Shoe Brush at the upcoming PGA Show. The brush features a built-in water canister and magnetic handle, designed for easy access on golf carts. This new product solves the problem of brushes being hard to reach and awkward to use.

articles.title: ONEPLUS FLAGSHIP 2025
articles.summary: OnePlus is planning to launch the OnePlus 15 smartphone in India. The device will feature the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor.

articles.title: NetDragon and Open University Malaysia Sign Strategic MOU to Jointly Explore New Models of AI-Powered ...
articles.author: Ashe Post
articles.summary: NetDragon Websoft Holdings Limited is a company mentioned in the provided press release context.

articles.title: China Focus: Chinese innovations convert smart ideas into global hits
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Chinese companies are introducing a variety of innovative products and services. Rokid launched new AR glasses in June 2025, receiving global orders for over 250,000 units. Jackery also introduced a new solar roof designed to blend seamlessly with terracotta roofs.

articles.title: Decade-Strong Gummy Chic LLC Proves Small Businesses Can Innovate Baby Products with Heart
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Gummy Chic LLC focuses on creating baby products and sensory tools tailored to parents' desires and children's needs. The company aims to offer products that reflect the lives of parents and provide sensory tools for children without making them feel different. Their approach involves listening to consumer feedback to identify and address unmet market needs.

articles.title: Snezzi Launches Generative Engine Optimization Platform to Help Brands Stay Visible in AI Search
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Snezzi launched its Generative Engine Optimization platform. The AI Visibility Platform from Snezzi helps businesses monitor, optimize, and scale their presence across AI-powered search experiences.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launched With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset, 7,300mAh Battery - Full Specs, ...
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch a new device. The new device features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, promising enhanced performance and device efficiency.

articles.title: Medical Care Technologies Inc. (OTC PINK:MDCE) Approved as an Official Google Play Developer
articles.author: Weatherford Democrat
articles.summary: A company has been approved to publish applications on the Google Play Store. This advancement of digital technology initiatives signals a new offering or service launch by the company.

articles.title: Dunelm's 'attention-grabbing' �35 accessory makes front of your house look 'dazzling'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering a new home accessory. This product could potentially spark conversation in homes.

articles.title: Lululemon stock rises after it partners with NFL to launch apparels for all 32 teams
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Lululemon and the NFL have partnered to launch a new apparel line. This represents a significant product launch for Lululemon, expanding its reach through collaboration.

articles.title: Zaxbys Serves Up More Ways to Unleash the Flavor Zensation With an Expanded Asian Zensation Lineup and a Sweet New Holiday Shake
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Zaxby's is offering early access to its expanded Asian Zensation menu items exclusively online, in the Zaxby's app, and on third-party delivery platforms starting October 27. The Asian Zensation Zalad™ has been made a permanent menu item.

articles.title: Qualcomm unveils new AI chips to compete with Nvidia, AMD - key features for you to take note
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Qualcomm has launched the Snapdragon 6s Gen 4. This is a new AI mobile chipset designed for [unspecified].

articles.title: Southend Lofts Archives
articles.summary: Dumbo Market is launching its first New Jersey supermarket location in the southwest corner of Hoboken. This marks the introduction of their services to a new area.
